changeSet.author: timler
changeSet.sql: UPDATE User SET id_temp = id;

ALTER TABLE User ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE User_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;
UPDATE User_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN User AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;
DELETE User_AUD FROM User_AUD LEFT JOIN User AS joinTable ON (User_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null

UPDATE AdverseEventType AS updateTable LEFT JOIN User AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.createdBy_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.createdBy_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
